page.title: 03GHOSTS OF SHERBORNE HOUSE
page.content:
Like many old buildings, Sherborne House (a 17th century mansion), has many tales of ghosts but few of them can be believed.
The Grey Lady is an elusive ghost. She likes wandering around the house undisturbed.Only one person has ever seen her,but he was so scared they never got a proper description of her.
The ghost of 'Crump Dutton' roams the upper floors of the house.When he was alive he was a compulsive gambler. Once his butler had to drag him screaming from the room after he staked the house on another game of cards.
